Hi, I'm Michelle Klug with Cooking Light and this is the latest in health news.
A new study all over 80,000 men and women...
...found that drinking green tea or coffee on a regular basis...
...may reduce the risk of stroke by 20 percent.
The Japanese study was published in the American Heart Association's journal "Stroke"...
...and recommended drinking four cups of green tea or one cup of coffee daily...
While coffee and tea aren't a cure-all, they can improve health...
...when combined with exercise and a healthy diet.
